description: The original admin api depended on member actions (/servers/1/diagnostics, /servers/1/pause, etc). All of those member actions moved to actions defined in extensions, so the new form should be like /servers/1/action with a body of {<ACTION>: {}}. We know diagnostics needs to be updated, but any others that were missed should also be addressed.
title: Ensure Admin API calls are properly formed in novaclient
